short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates player's min and max potential

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a button to the player screen that calculates and displays in minimum OVR that a player will grow to given the current stats. Also displays the maximum OVR that a player is capable of (despite this being unrealistic).
